Hotel.name: Splendid Venice Venezia â€“ Starhotels Collezione

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Starhotels Splendid Venice, you'll be centrally located in Venice, steps from San Salvador Church and Le Zitelle. This 4-star hotel is close to Rialto Bridge and St. Mark's Basilica.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 164 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Additional amenities include babysitting/childcare and a fireplace in the lobby.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Additional amenities include babysitting/childcare and a fireplace in the lobby.

Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at Starhotels Splendid Venice, you'll be centrally located in Venice, steps from San Salvador Church and Le Zitelle. This 4-star hotel is close to Rialto Bridge and St. Mark's Basilica.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

San Salvador Church - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Le Zitelle - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Goldoni's House - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Rialto Bridge - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
St Mark's Campanile - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Procuratie Vecchie - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
St. Mark's Basilica - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Galleria Stampalia - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Palazzo Contarini del Bovolo - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
St. Mark's Square - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Correr Civic Museum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Procuratie Nuove - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Teatro Malibran - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
St. Mark's Clocktower - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Palazzo Querini Stampalia - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi

The preferred airport for Starhotels Splendid Venice is Venice (VCE-Marco Polo) - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
